name: jwt-valid
description: Pass a jwt token and get a boolean if the token is valid
keywords: jwt, jwt valid, jwt still valid, valid, valid
author: Michael J. Zoidl

scripts.build: rimraf build && mkdir build && babel index.js --out-dir build
scripts.prepublish: yarn run standard && yarn run test && yarn run build
scripts.coverage: yarn run nyc && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls
scripts.prepublish: yarn run test && yarn run build
